actions.text: Amendment SA 1086, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.
Amendment SA 1086 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 1086 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Strange to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5795) To authorize $600,000,000 in increased funding for the procurement of one Littoral Combat Ship for the Navy above the President's budget request.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1086 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1086 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Strange to Amendment SA 1003.

amends_amendment.purpose: In the nature of a substitute.

purpose: To authorize $600,000,000 in increased funding for the procurement of one Littoral Combat Ship for the Navy above the President's budget request.
